name: Poetry of Code
tagline: This is where Dominique and Sallinger live.
body:
Welcome to Etherfly's humble GitHub haven. You being here probably means that you would like to get a glance at my first and currently only web-based project - an HTML5 RPG "Rat Rider Dominique".

# Rat Rider Dominique

It's a game inspired by jRPG genre, but with an exquisite taste of naive digital art.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
